luxweather

[![PyPi Version](http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/luxweather.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/luxweather/) [![Downloads](http://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/luxweather.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/luxweather/) [![Code Health](https://landscape.io/github/c0ding/luxweather/master/landscape.svg)](https://landscape.io/github/c0ding/luxweather/master) **luxweather** is an APACHE licensed [Twitter](https://twitter.com) weather bot written in Python. It is designed to tweet weather conditions and forecasts from [Yahoo!
